name: Angrboda, the Sunset Giant
text:
Break: Put this card into your hand.
When this card is a summon spell players cannot chase cards with total cost 4 or less.
Continuous: This card cannot be targeted by spells with total cost 4 or less or abilities on a card with total cost 4 or less.
Continuous: At the end of your recovery phase, pay WW2 or put this card on the bottom of your main deck.
Continuous: When this card deals battle damage to a player, you gain life equal to half of that damage (roud up to the nearest hundred).
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
